summary: Backend API testing complete for Radio Check - UK Veterans support app. All 17 tests passed covering Buddy Finder Inbox, CMS endpoints, and Call Logs for admin dashboard charts.
seed_data_creation: Created TEST_ prefixed call log entry during test (cleaned up)
context_for_next_testing_agent: All requested backend endpoints working. CMS has 6 pages (home, self-care, peer-support, organizations, family-friends, plus one more). Call-logs endpoint returns metrics for Chart.js (total_calls, calls_by_type, calls_by_method, calls_by_day). Buddy finder inbox returns {messages, profile_id, has_profile, unread_count} structure. Staff user sarahm.counsellor@radiocheck.me does not have a buddy profile (has_profile=false), so inbox returns empty messages array.

buddy_finder_inbox.GET /api/buddy-finder/inbox (with auth): PASS - Returns proper structure {messages, profile_id, has_profile, unread_count}
buddy_finder_inbox.response_structure: messages: array, profile_id: string|null, has_profile: boolean, unread_count: number

cms_pages.GET /api/cms/pages: PASS - Returns 6 visible pages (home, self-care, peer-support, organizations, family-friends)
cms_pages.GET /api/cms/pages/{slug}: PASS - Returns page with sections and cards
cms_pages.GET /api/cms/pages/all (admin): PASS - Returns all pages including hidden

call_logs.POST /api/call-logs: PASS - Public endpoint, creates call intent log
call_logs.GET /api/call-logs (admin): PASS - Returns metrics for charts {total_calls, period_days, calls_by_type, calls_by_method, calls_by_day, recent_logs}
call_logs.GET /api/call-logs?contact_type=counsell: PASS - Filter by contact type works

call_logs_metrics_example.calls_by_day: Object with date keys (YYYY-MM-DD) and count values
